text: Riyanka Chanda is an Indian television actress. Riyanka is best known for her role as Mehjabeen in the television series Khwaabon Ke Darmiyaan and as Sati's sister Khyati in Devon Ke Dev...Mahadev. ==Career== Riyanka started her career at the age of 14 years in the show Jai Shree Swaminarayan on Sab TV when she was in school. In 2014, she got the role of Khyati in Life OK 's mythological show Devon Ke Dev...Mahadev Riyanka has also worked in shows like Rab Se Sohna Ish on Zee TV India, Jai Jai Jai Bajrangbali on Sahara One, Laut Aao Trishaa on Life OK Hatim on Life OK, .. Episodic leads for Savdhaan India Crime Patrol etc. In 2016, she was cast the role of Mehjabeen, an Indian family girl, in the TV series Khwaabon Ke Darmiyaan {| class="wikitable sortable" !Year !Serial !Role !
